      Constructor taking the a PersonRepository
      Parameters:
      objectMapper - Object Mapper for converting to JSON
      openCDXAuditService - Audit service for tracking FDA requirements
      openCDXIAMUserRepository - Repository for saving users.
      passwordEncoder - Password Encoder to use for encrypting and testing passwords.
      authenticationManager - AuthenticationManager for the service
      jwtTokenUtil - Utility class for JWT Tokens
      openCDXCurrentUser - Current User Service
      appProperties - App Properties is used to set the common variables to supply from config.
      openCDXCommunicationService - Communication Client for triggering events
      openCDXProfileRepository - OpenCDXProfileRepository for saving user profiles.
